name: Key to the Kingdom
description:
Key to the Kingdom is a 3D platformer based on UE4 Hour of Code project files. It has been carefully and lovingly redesigned in a traditional Japanese lantern festival aesthetic. 

Players will navigate floating islands, moving bridges, and other hazards (lava golems, anyone?) to collect coins, gems, and the all-important Kingdom Key to reach the final end goal. 

Controls have been configured as per standard gaming conventions. Controller support is included. 

Action remapping is available in-game by pressing the 'm' key or right thumbstick button if using a controller. 

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
Suggested recommended specifications:
OS: Microsoft Windows 10/11
Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or equivalent
Memory: 4 GB Ram
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
Storage: 200 MB available space
Sound card: Windows compatible card

Simply download the file below, unzip, and run the executable.*

*only available for Windows

Background music - Japan by Uniq |Listen  here
